basics.name: Alois de Gouvello
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Alois hails from Paris. He has earned a degree from Epitech. He likes to create a lot of differents stuffs, mostly with a computer.

work.summary: The mission was to design and development an animate greeting card for Christmas and New Year. I use HTML5/CSS3 and JavaScript with JQuery.
highlights: Create a design who follow entreprise's guidelines
Respect an absolute deadline
Create a responsive page

work.summary: As a writer, I share, argue and write a lot about Windows Phone's news. I had to write one article per week. Most of them was made threw translation and information merging.
highlights: Work with good writing styles
Handle community feedbacks, problems and comments

work.summary: I had to port an old website from Flash to HTML5/CSS3. I handle the registration of the dns and the shipping.
highlights: Port a flash-based website to HTML5
Subscribe to a hoster and manage the server
Release in production the website

work.summary: First official internship. I work on local softwares and apps. I use ASPx.NET MVC with Razor and WinJS for Windows Store Apps.
highlights: Discover a backend technology
Creation of a lot of application for Windows 8

work.summary: As a Microsoft Student Partners (MSP), I share my passion around new technology and Microsoft's products with people from my school and more.
highlights: Assist on .NET ecosystem
Present and share informations about Windows, Windows Phone and more
Manage data with SQL Server
Development of a ASP.NET MVC WebApi
Development of a Portable Class Library to play with the API
Development of a Windows Phone application
Amélioration d'un outil de suivi interne utilisant Excel en C#.NET/WPF
Create a graphic charter for an intern project
Développement d'un backoffice MVC4 et d'une API
Création de maquette pour un produit interne
Développement d'une Webapp utilisant Cordova, Ionic, Sass, AngularJS et TypeScript.
Development C#6, ASP.NET CORE, MVC, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap 4, JavaScript, Typescript, SQL Server
Architecture API REST
Angular 6 (Conception, Design, development)
UI Tests (Selenium)
TFS (TFVC then GIT)
CI/CD (TFS Build + Octopus)
Agile Method (Kanban, Speed Boat, Poker planning, Fist of Five Voting)

courses: Development in C, C++, Shell, Python, C#, SQL

volunteer.summary: The open source initiative to create a JSON-based standard for resumes. For developers, by developers.
highlights: Released 'SharpResume', a C# PCL for JSONResume
Involved in discussions and issues around the spec on resume-schema

volunteer.summary: Humanizer meets all your .NET needs for manipulating and displaying strings, enums, dates, times, timespans, numbers and quantities.
highlights: Add support of metric numeral expression
Add unitary tests to valid the feature

references.name: Gil Pla
references.reference: Alois c'est très rapidement intégré à l'équipe, il fait preuve d'une réelle implication dans les projets et dans la vie de l'équipe. Nous apprécions ses qualités techniques, celles qu'il connait et celles qu'il acquiert très rapidement ainsi que ses qualités humaines. Nous apprécions également sa capacité à être force de proposition technique et sa capacité a argumenter ces choix.
